verbs.description: [ARG0: snow angel cookies] [V: get] [ARG1: a little snow] [ARGM-TMP: at the holidays] [ARGM-ADV: no matter where you are head to the kitchen] and bake a batch of angel cookies swirled with heavenly frosting —carolyn moseley dayton ohio snow
